# mapbox::variant Conan Package

[Conan.io](https://conan.io) package for the [mapbox::variant](https://github.com/mapbox/variant) library.

[![badge](https://img.shields.io/badge/conan.io-mapbox-variant%2F1.1.2-green.svg?logo=data:image/png;base64%2CiVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAAA4AAAAOCAMAAAAolt3jAAAA1VBMVEUAAABhlctjlstkl8tlmMtlmMxlmcxmmcxnmsxpnMxpnM1qnc1sn85voM91oM11oc1xotB2oc56pNF6pNJ2ptJ8ptJ8ptN9ptN8p9N5qNJ9p9N9p9R8qtOBqdSAqtOAqtR%2BrNSCrNJ/rdWDrNWCsNWCsNaJs9eLs9iRvNuVvdyVv9yXwd2Zwt6axN6dxt%2Bfx%2BChyeGiyuGjyuCjyuGly%2BGlzOKmzOGozuKoz%2BKqz%2BOq0OOv1OWw1OWw1eWx1eWy1uay1%2Baz1%2Baz1%)](http://www.conan.io/source/mapbox-variant/1.1.2/hinrikg/stable)

mapbox::variant is an alternative to boost::variant for C++11 and C++14

## Usage

    $ conan install mapbox-variant/1.1.2@hinrikg/stable

or add the package as a dependency in your conanfile.txt

    [requires]
    mapbox-variant/1.1.2@hinrikg/stable

For further information on how to use Conan see [the Conan documentation](http://docs.conan.io/)
